subject: Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: Amar’e Stoudemire, who took a much-publicized trip to Israel in 2010, will return this summer as an assistant coach for Canada in the Maccabiah Games.
snippet: Amar’e Stoudemire, who took a much-publicized trip to Israel in 2010, will return this summer as an assistant coach for Canada in the Maccabiah Games.
